articles.title: Vietnamese boy trapped in concrete pit still out of reach after nearly three days - The Star Online
articles.description: HANOI (Vietnam News/Asia News Network): Local authorities were still racing against time on Tuesday to rescue a 10-year-old boy trapped in a 35m-deep concrete pipe pit in the southern province of Dong Thap since Saturday (Dec 24) afternoon.

articles.description: After their respective agencies revealed that the singer-actress and model-turned-actor have been dating for the past four months, the pair proceeded to address their new love via letters to their fan clubs.
articles.content:
